Definition: You are given a piece of text. Your task is to determine whether the text contains hate speech against a religion or against a person/group of people based on their religion. If the text contains hate speech against a religion, answer with 'religious hate'. If the text does not contain hate speech against a religion, answer with 'not religious hate'.
